Quote.Author: Chester Bennington
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not cool to be an alcoholic

Quote.Author: Chester Bennington
Quote.QuoteValue: This is a business of love and labor

Quote.Author: Chester Bennington
Quote.QuoteValue: We're not a political band, we're a socially-minded band

Quote.Author: Chester Bennington
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't sit down and go, 'People are uneasy about the economy. Let's write about that.'

Quote.Author: Christopher Hitchens
Quote.QuoteValue: What can be asserted without evidence can be dismissed without evidence

Quote.Author: Christopher Hitchens
Quote.QuoteValue: There are all kinds of stupid people that annoy me but what annoys me most is a lazy argument

Quote.Author: Christopher Hitchens
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm crepuscular

Quote.Author: Christopher Hitchens
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel upsettingly de-natured. If Penelope Cruz were one of my nurses, I wouldn't even notice

Quote.Author: Christopher Hitchens
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't envy or much respect people who are completely politicised

Quote.Author: Christopher Hitchens
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think it's possible to have a sense of tragedy without having a sense of humor

Quote.Author: Christopher Hitchens
Quote.QuoteValue: I was becoming post-ideological

Quote.Author: Christopher Hitchens
Quote.QuoteValue: The concept of loneliness and exile and self-sufficiency continually bucks me up

Quote.Author: Christopher Hitchens
Quote.QuoteValue: Trust is not the same as faith. A friend is someone you trust. Putting faith in anyone is a mistake

Quote.Author: Christopher Hitchens
Quote.QuoteValue: I still think like a Marxist in many ways

Quote.Author: Clint Eastwood
Quote.QuoteValue: They say marriages are made in Heaven. But so is thunder and lightning

Quote.Author: Clint Eastwood
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want a guarantee, buy a toaster

Quote.Author: Clint Eastwood
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a very strict gun control policy: if there's a gun around, I want to be in control of it

Quote.Author: Clint Eastwood
Quote.QuoteValue: What you put into life is what you get out of it

Quote.Author: Clint Eastwood
Quote.QuoteValue: I tried being reasonable, I didn't like it

Quote.Author: Clint Eastwood
Quote.QuoteValue: Fate pulls you in different directions

Quote.Author: Clint Eastwood
Quote.QuoteValue: The less secure a man is, the more likely he is to have extreme prejudice

Quote.Author: Clint Eastwood
Quote.QuoteValue: You should never give up your inner self

Quote.Author: Clint Eastwood
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I've met anyone with a stronger work ethic than Ray Charles

Quote.Author: Clint Eastwood
Quote.QuoteValue: I think being able to age gracefully is a very important talent. It is too late for me

Quote.Author: Coco Chanel
Quote.QuoteValue: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous

Quote.Author: Coco Chanel
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion fades, only style remains the same

Quote.Author: Coco Chanel
Quote.QuoteValue: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different

Quote.Author: Coco Chanel
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is architecture: it is a matter of proportions

Quote.Author: Coco Chanel
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people think luxury is the opposite of poverty. It is not. It is the opposite of vulgarity

Quote.Author: Coco Chanel
Quote.QuoteValue: Hard times arouse an instinctive desire for authenticity

Quote.Author: Coco Chanel
Quote.QuoteValue: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud

Quote.Author: Coco Chanel
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door

Quote.Author: Coco Chanel
Quote.QuoteValue: Luxury must be comfortable, otherwise it is not luxury

Quote.Author: Coco Chanel
Quote.QuoteValue: Look for the woman in the dress. If there is no woman, there is no dress

Quote.Author: Colin Powell
Quote.QuoteValue: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work

Quote.Author: Colin Powell
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence

Quote.Author: Colin Powell
Quote.QuoteValue: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier

Quote.Author: Colin Powell
Quote.QuoteValue: It ain't as bad as you think. It will look better in the morning

Quote.Author: Colin Powell
Quote.QuoteValue: The healthiest competition occurs when average people win by putting above average effort

Quote.Author: Colin Powell
Quote.QuoteValue: The commander in the field is always right and the rear echelon is wrong, unless proved otherwise

Quote.Author: Colin Powell
Quote.QuoteValue: Experts often possess more data than judgment

Quote.Author: Colin Powell
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics is not bean bags. It's serious, tough stuff

Quote.Author: Colin Powell
Quote.QuoteValue: Giving back involves a certain amount of giving up

Quote.Author: Colin Powell
Quote.QuoteValue: Bad news isn't wine. It doesn't improve with age

Quote.Author: Conor McGregor
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing about the truth is, not a lot of people can handle it

Quote.Author: Conor McGregor
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just trying to be myself. I'm not trying to be anyone else

Quote.Author: Conor McGregor
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is about growing and improving and getting better

Quote.Author: Conor McGregor
Quote.QuoteValue: My success isn't a result of arrogance - it's a result of belief

Quote.Author: Conor McGregor
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I have a little bit of an ego. I'm confidently cocky, you might say

Quote.Author: Conor McGregor
Quote.QuoteValue: When I say something's going to happen, it's going to happen

Quote.Author: Conor McGregor
Quote.QuoteValue: Competition gives me energy. It keeps me focused

Quote.Author: Conor McGregor
Quote.QuoteValue: It's good to make your brain work more than your body

Quote.Author: Conor McGregor
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll die a crazy old man!

Quote.Author: Conor McGregor
Quote.QuoteValue: We come bulletproof in Ireland. We're reared tough, and we fight

Quote.Author: e. e. cummings
Quote.QuoteValue: The most wasted of all days is one without laughter

Quote.Author: e. e. cummings
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are

Quote.Author: e. e. cummings
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather learn from one bird how to sing than teach ten thousand stars how not to dance

Quote.Author: e. e. cummings
Quote.QuoteValue: Listen; there's a hell of a good universe next door: let's go

Quote.Author: e. e. cummings
Quote.QuoteValue: Humanity I love you because when you're hard up you pawn your intelligence to buy a drink

Quote.Author: e. e. cummings
Quote.QuoteValue: To destroy is always the first step in any creation

Quote.Author: e. e. cummings
Quote.QuoteValue: I imagine that yes is the only living thing

Quote.Author: e. e. cummings
Quote.QuoteValue: Kisses are a better fate than wisdom

Quote.Author: e. e. cummings
Quote.QuoteValue: A politician is an arse upon which everyone has sat except a man

Quote.Author: e. e. cummings
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is mud-luscious and puddle-wonderful

Quote.Author: Eckhart Tolle
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is an adventure, it's not a package tour

Quote.Author: Eckhart Tolle
Quote.QuoteValue: Being at ease with not knowing is crucial for answers to come to you

Quote.Author: Eckhart Tolle
Quote.QuoteValue: Power over others is weakness disguised as strength

Quote.Author: Eckhart Tolle
Quote.QuoteValue: It is through gratitude for the present moment that the spiritual dimension of life opens up

Quote.Author: Eckhart Tolle
Quote.QuoteValue: Many people identify their sense of self with the problems they have, or think they have

Quote.Author: Eckhart Tolle
Quote.QuoteValue: You are the universe, you aren't in the universe

Quote.Author: Eckhart Tolle
Quote.QuoteValue: If there are people you haven't forgiven, you're not going to really awaken. You have to let go

Quote.Author: Eckhart Tolle
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing you ever have is now

Quote.Author: Eckhart Tolle
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm grateful for always this moment, the now, no matter what form it takes

Quote.Author: Eckhart Tolle
Quote.QuoteValue: If small things have the power to disturb you, then who you think you are is exactly that: small

Quote.Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote.QuoteValue: Words have no power to impress the mind without the exquisite horror of their reality

Quote.Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote.QuoteValue: They who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night

Quote.Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote.QuoteValue: All religion, my friend, is simply evolved out of fraud, fear, greed, imagination, and poetry

Quote.Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote.QuoteValue: All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream

Quote.Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote.QuoteValue: Once upon a midnight dreary, while I pondered weak and weary

Quote.Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote.QuoteValue: I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity

Quote.Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish I could write as mysterious as a cat

Quote.Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty of whatever kind, in its supreme development, invariably excites the sensitive soul to tears

Quote.Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote.QuoteValue: Stupidity is a talent for misconception

Quote.Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote.QuoteValue: I have great faith in fools; self-confidence my friends call it

Quote.Author: Edmund Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing

Quote.Author: Edmund Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: All tyranny needs to gain a foothold is for people of good conscience to remain silent

Quote.Author: Edmund Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: To read without reflecting is like eating without digesting

Quote.Author: Edmund Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little

Quote.Author: Edmund Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: The greater the power, the more dangerous the abuse

Quote.Author: Edmund Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: The traveller has reached the end of the journey!

Quote.Author: Edmund Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: Never despair, but if you do, work on in despair

Quote.Author: Edmund Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: To make us love our country, our country ought to be lovely

Quote.Author: Edmund Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who don't know history are destined to repeat it

Quote.Author: Edmund Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: One that confounds good and evil is an enemy to good

Quote.Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts

Quote.Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman is like a tea bag - you can't tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water

Quote.Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams

Quote.Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people

Quote.Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: We are afraid to care too much, for fear that the other person does not care at all

Quote.Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: You must do the things you think you cannot do

Quote.Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: It is better to light a candle than curse the darkness

Quote.Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent

Quote.Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not fair to ask of others what you are not willing to do yourself

Quote.Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: The giving of love is an education in itself

Quote.Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote.QuoteValue: The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference

Quote.Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote.QuoteValue: Our obligation is to give meaning to life and in doing so to overcome the passive, indifferent life

Quote.Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote.QuoteValue: I will say, with memoir, you must be honest. You must be truthful

Quote.Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote.QuoteValue: Because I remember, I despair. Because I remember, I have the duty to reject despair

Quote.Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote.QuoteValue: If I were immersed in constant melancholy, I would not be who I am

Quote.Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you bring life into the world, you must protect it. We must protect it by changing the world

Quote.Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote.QuoteValue: Words can sometimes, in moments of grace, attain the quality of deeds

Quote.Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote.QuoteValue: Indifference, to me, is the epitome of evil

Quote.Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote.QuoteValue: Because of indifference, one dies before one actually dies

Quote.Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote.QuoteValue: Not to transmit an experience is to betray it

Quote.Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote.QuoteValue: People always ask me, 'Were you funny as a child?' Well, no, I was an accountant

Quote.Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing says holidays, like a cheese log

Quote.Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote.QuoteValue: I think they should have a Barbie with a buzz cut

Quote.Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote.QuoteValue: Just go up to somebody on the street and say 'You're it!' and then run away

Quote.Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote.QuoteValue: I have sadness in me. I have anger in me. I have heartbreak in me

Quote.Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you can't see yourself clearly until you see yourself through the eyes of others

Quote.Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote.QuoteValue: People love gossip. It's the biggest thing that keeps the entertainment industry going

Quote.Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote.QuoteValue: I would love for the world to be happier

Quote.Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a lesbian, an Aquarian, and a vegetarian

Quote.Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote.QuoteValue: I love clothes, so when I wear clothes, they're usually somebody's. You know, I'm not wearing Kmart

Quote.Author: Elon Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor

Quote.Author: Elon Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: Patience is a virtue, and I'm learning patience. It's a tough lesson

Quote.Author: Elon Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is too short for long-term grudges

Quote.Author: Elon Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people don't like change, but you need to embrace change if the alternative is disaster

Quote.Author: Elon Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: Great companies are built on great products

Quote.Author: Elon Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: Any product that needs a manual to work is broken

Quote.Author: Elon Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: It's OK to have your eggs in one basket as long as you control what happens to that basket

Quote.Author: Elon Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: I would like to die on Mars. Just not on impact

Quote.Author: Elon Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: Really, the only thing that makes sense is to strive for greater collective enlightenment

Quote.Author: Elon Musk
Quote.QuoteValue: I do love email. Wherever possible I try to communicate asynchronously. I'm really good at email

Quote.Author: Elvis Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not trying to be sexy. It's just my way of expressing myself when I move around

Quote.Author: Elvis Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth is like the sun. You can shut it out for a time, but it ain't goin' away

Quote.Author: Elvis Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: Until we meet again, may God bless you as he has blessed me

Quote.Author: Elvis Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: The Lord can give, and the Lord can take away. I might be herding sheep next year

Quote.Author: Elvis Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever I will become will be what God has chosen for me

Quote.Author: Elvis Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: I did the Ed Sullivan show four times. I did the Steve Allen show. I did the Jackie Gleason show

Quote.Author: Elvis Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: Ambition is a dream with a V8 engine

Quote.Author: Elvis Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I have something tonight that's not quite correct for evening wear. Blue suede shoes

Quote.Author: Elvis Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: Rhythm is something you either have or don't have, but when you have it, you have it all over

Quote.Author: Elvis Presley
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I think that I'm getting old, and gradually going to the grave, something else happens

Quote.Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Morning without you is a dwindled dawn

Quote.Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: The soul should always stand ajar, ready to welcome the ecstatic experience

Quote.Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope you love birds too. It is economical. It saves going to heaven

Quote.Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Unable are the loved to die, for love is immortality

Quote.Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Saying nothing... sometimes says the most

Quote.Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: To live is so startling it leaves little time for anything else

Quote.Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever a thing is done for the first time, it releases a little demon

Quote.Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: A wounded deer leaps the highest

Quote.Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm nobody, who are you?

Quote.Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth is so rare that it is delightful to tell it

Quote.Author: Eminem
Quote.QuoteValue: Somewhere deep down there's a decent man in me, he just can't be found

Quote.Author: Eminem
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm stupid, I'm ugly, I'm dumb, I smell. Did I mention I'm stupid?

Quote.Author: Eminem
Quote.QuoteValue: My father? I never knew him. Never even seen a picture of him

Quote.Author: Eminem
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I feel like rap music is almost the key to stopping racism

Quote.Author: Eminem
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything I've ever said, I certainly was feeling at the time

Quote.Author: Eminem
Quote.QuoteValue: These times are so hard, and they're getting even harder

Quote.Author: Eminem
Quote.QuoteValue: I am whatever you say I am; if I wasn't, then why would you say I am

Quote.Author: Eminem
Quote.QuoteValue: I was poor white trash, no glitter, no glamour, but I'm not ashamed of anything

Quote.Author: Eminem
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing on 'Relapse' and very little on 'Recovery' was produced by me

Quote.Author: Eminem
Quote.QuoteValue: It's just hard to meet new people, in my position

Quote.Author: Epictetus
Quote.QuoteValue: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best

Quote.Author: Epictetus
Quote.QuoteValue: We have two ears and one mouth so that we can listen twice as much as we speak

Quote.Author: Epictetus
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters

Quote.Author: Epictetus
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes more than just a good looking body. You've got to have the heart and soul to go with it

Quote.Author: Epictetus
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep silence for the most part, and speak only when you must, and then briefly

Quote.Author: Epictetus
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to improve, be content to be thought foolish and stupid

Quote.Author: Epictetus
Quote.QuoteValue: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants

Quote.Author: Epictetus
Quote.QuoteValue: Difficulties are things that show a person what they are

Quote.Author: Epictetus
Quote.QuoteValue: First learn the meaning of what you say, and then speak

Quote.Author: Epictetus
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are disturbed not by things, but by the view which they take of them

Quote.Author: Erma Bombeck
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a thin line that separates laughter and pain, comedy and tragedy, humor and hurt

Quote.Author: Erma Bombeck
Quote.QuoteValue: Never go to a doctor whose office plants have died

Quote.Author: Erma Bombeck
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't confuse fame with success. Madonna is one; Helen Keller is the other

Quote.Author: Erma Bombeck
Quote.QuoteValue: Dreams have only one owner at a time. That's why dreamers are lonely

Quote.Author: Erma Bombeck
Quote.QuoteValue: I come from a family where gravy is considered a beverage

Quote.Author: Erma Bombeck
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not until you become a mother that your judgment slowly turns to compassion and understanding

Quote.Author: Erma Bombeck
Quote.QuoteValue: The only reason I would take up jogging is so that I could hear heavy breathing again

Quote.Author: Erma Bombeck
Quote.QuoteValue: If a man watches three football games in a row, he should be declared legally dead

Quote.Author: Erma Bombeck
Quote.QuoteValue: In two decades I've lost a total of 789 pounds. I should be hanging from a charm bracelet

Quote.Author: Erma Bombeck
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I can't figure designers out. It's as if they flunked human anatomy

Quote.Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them

Quote.Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote.QuoteValue: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places

Quote.Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote.QuoteValue: Never go on trips with anyone you do not love

Quote.Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote.QuoteValue: An intelligent man is sometimes forced to be drunk to spend time with his fools

Quote.Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote.QuoteValue: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?

Quote.Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote.QuoteValue: Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut

Quote.Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to listen. I have learned a great deal from listening carefully. Most people never listen

Quote.Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing to writing. All you do is sit down at a typewriter and bleed

Quote.Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote.QuoteValue: Never mistake motion for action

Quote.Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote.QuoteValue: Courage is grace under pressure

Quote.Author: Euripides
Quote.QuoteValue: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness

Quote.Author: Euripides
Quote.QuoteValue: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives

Quote.Author: Euripides
Quote.QuoteValue: To a father growing old nothing is dearer than a daughter

Quote.Author: Euripides
Quote.QuoteValue: He is not a lover who does not love forever

Quote.Author: Euripides
Quote.QuoteValue: Silence is true wisdom's best reply

Quote.Author: Euripides
Quote.QuoteValue: The good and the wise lead quiet lives

Quote.Author: Euripides
Quote.QuoteValue: There is the sky, which is all men's together

Quote.Author: Euripides
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing has more strength than dire necessity

Quote.Author: Euripides
Quote.QuoteValue: He was a wise man who originated the idea of God

Quote.Author: Euripides
Quote.QuoteValue: Fortune truly helps those who are of good judgment

Quote.Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Quote.QuoteValue: Personality is an unbroken series of successful gestures

Quote.Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Quote.QuoteValue: Vitality shows in not only the ability to persist but the ability to start over

Quote.Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Quote.QuoteValue: Never confuse a single defeat with a final defeat

Quote.Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Quote.QuoteValue: There are only the pursued, the pursuing, the busy and the tired

Quote.Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Quote.QuoteValue: Genius is the ability to put into effect what is on your mind

Quote.Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Quote.QuoteValue: Show me a hero and I'll write you a tragedy

Quote.Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody's youth is a dream, a form of chemical madness

Quote.Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Quote.QuoteValue: All good writing is swimming under water and holding your breath

Quote.Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Quote.QuoteValue: Great art is the contempt of a great man for small art

Quote.Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Quote.QuoteValue: A great social success is a pretty girl who plays her cards as carefully as if she were plain

Quote.Author: Fidel Castro
Quote.QuoteValue: The revolution is a dictatorship of the exploited against the exploiters

Quote.Author: Fidel Castro
Quote.QuoteValue: A revolution is a struggle to the death between the future and the past

Quote.Author: Fidel Castro
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think anyone has been slandered more than the Jews

Quote.Author: Fidel Castro
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a Marxist Leninist and I will be one until the last day of my life

Quote.Author: Fidel Castro
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always fought for concrete facts, for justice

Quote.Author: Fidel Castro
Quote.QuoteValue: I can assure you that my first and foremost interest is my country

Quote.Author: Fidel Castro
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a communist and neither is the revolutionary movement

Quote.Author: Fidel Castro
Quote.QuoteValue: Capitalism is using its money; we socialists throw it away

Quote.Author: Fidel Castro
Quote.QuoteValue: I am Fidel Castro and we have come to liberate Cuba

Quote.Author: Fidel Castro
Quote.QuoteValue: How can we help President Obama?

Quote.Author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: A true champion will fight through anything

Quote.Author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: You have good days, you have bad days. But the main thing is to grow mentally

Quote.Author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: A true champion can adapt to anything

Quote.Author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always going to love my father

Quote.Author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to play table tennis, spend time with my kids

Quote.Author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm looking to expand my portfolio while I'm on top and while I'm young

Quote.Author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the best. There is nobody better than me

Quote.Author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't took no punishment. There's nothing cool about taking punishment

Quote.Author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I've set the model of showing fighters how they should conduct their business

Quote.Author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not in this sport to say a guy can beat me

Quote.Author: Francis Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: In order for the light to shine so brightly, the darkness must be present

Quote.Author: Francis Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: Reading maketh a full man; conference a ready man; and writing an exact man

Quote.Author: Francis Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: Travel, in the younger sort, is a part of education; in the elder, a part of experience

Quote.Author: Francis Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowledge is power

Quote.Author: Francis Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: A man that studieth revenge keeps his own wounds green

Quote.Author: Francis Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: A bachelor's life is a fine breakfast, a flat lunch, and a miserable dinner

Quote.Author: Francis Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: The momentous thing in human life is the art of winning the soul to good or evil

Quote.Author: Francis Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: Hope is a good breakfast, but it is a bad supper

Quote.Author: Francis Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: Some books are to be tasted, others to be swallowed, and some few to be chewed and digested

Quote.Author: Francis Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: God hangs the greatest weights upon the smallest wires

Quote.Author: Francis of Assisi
Quote.QuoteValue: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible

Quote.Author: Francis of Assisi
Quote.QuoteValue: Lord, make me an instrument of thy peace. Where there is hatred, let me sow love

Quote.Author: Francis of Assisi
Quote.QuoteValue: Where there is charity and wisdom, there is neither fear nor ignorance

Quote.Author: Francis of Assisi
Quote.QuoteValue: A single sunbeam is enough to drive away many shadows

Quote.Author: Francis of Assisi
Quote.QuoteValue: It is no use walking anywhere to preach unless our walking is our preaching

Quote.Author: Francis of Assisi
Quote.QuoteValue: If God can work through me, he can work through anyone
